revised_title: An Account of an Extraordinary Sized Human Skeleton and Examples of Long Life
tldr: The author shares the discovery of a human skeleton of extraordinary size found in a repository at Repton in Derbyshire, along with several examples of long life from the same region. The skeleton, measuring nine feet long, was found alongside 100 other human skeletons, and the author also provides information on the longevity of people in nearby areas.
